description: These beef and beetroot burgers are a great way to get extra veggies into dinner and they taste great too.
name: Beef & Beetroot Burger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the beef mince, egg yolk, red onion and Worcestershire sauce in a bowl and mix well. Grate one cooked beetroot in and mix to combine.
Shape the mix into patties. Heat the oil in a large pan on a high heat, add the burgers and fry for 5 minutes on each side.
In a small bowl, mix the Greek yoghurt, soft goats cheese and lemon juice to form a smooth sauce. Slice the remaining beetroot into thin discs.
Serve the burgers on the wholemeal buns topped with a dollop of the goats cheese sauce, sliced beetroot and watercress.
